name: Active Password Changer Ultimate 26.1.4
summary: Free Download Active Password Changer Ultimate 26.1.4 Full Version - Reset local administrators and user passwords.
description: It is designed to reset local administrators' and users' passwords on the Windows operating system if an Administrator's password is forgotten or lost. You don't need to re-install and re-configure the operating system to log into Windows. With this tool, you can log in as an Administrator or a particular user with a blank password.

minimum: Supported OS: Windows 11 / Windows 10 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 7
Processor: Multi-core Intel Series or above, Xeon or AMD equivalent
recommended: Free Hard Disk Space: 4GB or more recommended
